channel.title: Donating to soundtrack without paypal memebership
channel.description:
Hi!
I'd very much like to donate to the soundtrack, but when I chose the no-paypal option and choose my country (Denmark) it transform into a paypal registration form instead of a "guest" form. Is that a bug or a scheme from paypal to get new clients?
Is there another way of donating? - since I'm not at all interested in making a paypal account!
And I just want to say Great work guys!!!
